HERO_text1: Specialized in web development, electronics, and embedded systems. Passionate about technological innovation and creative solutions.
ABOUT_text1: Passionate developer with over 5 years of experience creating innovative technological solutions, combining modern web development and expertise in embedded systems.
ABOUT_text2: My journey has led me to master a wide range of technologies, from responsive web applications to complex embedded systems. I always prioritize innovation and quality in every project.
PROJECTS_text1: Discover a selection of my most recent projects, combining creativity, technical innovation, and exceptional user experience.
CONTACT_text1: Ready to start your next project? Get in touch to discuss your ideas and see how we can bring them to life together.
CONTACT_text3: I'm always open to new opportunities and innovative projects. Feel free to reach out to discuss your needs.
CONTACT_text4: I usually reply within 24 hours. For urgent projects, feel free to call me directly.

FOOTER_text1: Fullstack developer passionate about technological innovation and creating high-performance digital solutions.
